comment._content: Você esta sendo convidado a ADICIONAR sua bela fotografia no grupo "Made in Portugal" Adicione sua foto no grupo: www.flickr.com/groups/madeinportugal/ Adicione a TAG: "Made in Portugal"(entre aspas)

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: translation: "Radio Free Europe -- North American radio relay equipment installed in the municipality of Salvaterra de Magos, to relay programs to the Eastern bloc as part of the strategy to fight communism." Undated photograph by Mário Novais.
